sub_title: Manager Corporate IT Governance, Risk & Compliance and Project Management at Nutreco
summary:
As an Industrial Engineer (MSc) I have more than 20 years of experience in designing, consulting, implementing, supporting and managing changes to logistics business (ERP) software. I have worked with several software applications/vendors together with many customers in a wide range of  businesses, such as engineering & production of customer specific goods, service & maintenance, sheltered workshops, the building supply industry, food & beverages and the fashion industry. At customers I have worked in fields like CRM, customer order management, logistics and purchasing, planning and production, object and service management. Besides that I have also knowledge of project management and document management.
Beside functonal area’s like object and service management, cost based invoicing and cycle counting, I have contributed to the development of new software in non functional area’s like replication and usability. The latter requires a more abstract approach, which suits me well.

It is my goal to contribute to a company in the field of information management. As an intermediair between business and IT, I improve the effectiveness and efficiency of operational, tactical and strategic processes by applying IT solutions and improving IT processes.

I like to see something of myself in the company I work with, either in processes, the IT landscape or in its products.

Specialties: Proces analysis, Processes and procedures, Identify and analyse problems, Advise and implement improvements, Holistic view, Abstract and pragmatic approach, Creative, Communication and presentation, Specific but standardised solutions, Logistics, Business software, Requirements, Design, Usability

profile_positions.title: Manager Corporate IT Governance, Risk & Compliance and Project Management

profile_positions.description: Leading a multi cultural team of IT Governance, Risk & Compliance experts, with a focus on IT process design.
profile_positions.title: Manager IT Governance, Risk & Compliance

profile_positions.description: Improve IT processes. Implement ServiceNow at Nutreco with a focus on foundation data, change management and service catalogue, including approval and fulfilment process..
profile_positions.title: IT Process Manager

profile_positions.description: Manage the change process for all centrally managed applications (M3, CRM, Business Objects, BizzTalk), in line with TOPEX – the Nutreco process definition. Host the weekly Change Advisory Board meetings with business unit IT managers and process information managers. Promote the documentation, approval, registration and use of standard changes. Manage the controlled implementation and registration of emergency changes. Inform all stakeholders on scheduled and implemented changes. Improve the change process, the CAB meetings and the use of ITSM. Implement key controls for change management.
profile_positions.title: Change Manager

profile_positions.description: Support of Nutreco divisions and companies world wide using the ERP system Movex. Incident, problem and change management. Contribute to migration to M3 project.
profile_positions.title: Movex Support Engineer / Internal ERP Consultant
System Designer / Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
Implement the ERP solution Movex and Movex Sales & Marketing (CRM) at several sites like Bakker Lekkerkerk (Food, Lekkerkerk) and Iduna (Fashion, Uden).
Presales consultancy at Swedish Match (Assen)
profile_positions.title: Consultant Movex

profile_positions.description:
Implement the ERP solution Profit/AS at several sites like Opstalan (Oisterwijk), DSW (Dordrecht) and Trio Bedrijven (Sappemeer). Analysis, design, managing development projects, test and document for standard and custom specific solutions.
Specific development projects are: Cycle counting, Interface with Info Groen.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Profit/AS

profile_positions.description:
Perform several projects for the company's management like:
- investigate the possibility of a centralised archive for physical addvertisement material (not yet digital then) such as logo's, photo's and text
- write a business plan for a possible new joint venture with De Stem concerning folder distribution
profile_positions.title: Staff Member
